text: Johanan became the father of Azariah, who served as priest in the temple Solomon built in Jerusalem.
From there he moved on and took Chaspho, Maked, Bosor, and the other cities of Gilead.
Do not swear by your head, for you cannot make a single hair white or black.
Disregarding the message that was reported, Jesus said to the synagogue official, “Do not be afraid; just have faith.”
And he also told them a parable. “No one tears a piece from a new cloak to patch an old one. Otherwise, he will tear the new and the piece from it will not match the old cloak.
But I have testimony greater than John's. The works that the Father gave me to accomplish, these works that I perform testify on my behalf that the Father has sent me.
Some time ago, Theudas appeared, claiming to be someone important, and about four hundred men joined him, but he was killed, and all those who were loyal to him were disbanded and came to nothing.
